name: FLYING PIG (AKTIVE GAMES)
description:
*NEW VERSION 2.1.1*

-NEW GAME MODE: CHIKEN MODE

-FIXED BUG: FL-12, FL-13, FL-14 y FL-15

-GAMES MODE HAVE BEEN BALANCED

-THE INTERFACE HAS BEEN REDESIGNED

Flying Pig is a casual game where you have to dodge cows and chickens and collect bacon. 7 difficulty modes and 3 different game modes:

Free Mode - this mode is the classic mode where you have to dodge cows and chickens and hold out as long as possible.

Save The Bacon - in this mode there are no enemies but if you don't collect a piece of bacon you lose

Chiken Mode - the only enemy is chickens
